mapper.select: select b_sentiment, count(*) as cnt from board where m_id=#{mid} group by b_sentiment
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b_sentiment, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM board WHERE m_id = #{mid} AND TRUNC(regdate, 'mm') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'mm') GROUP BY b_sentiment ORDER BY cnt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT b.b_id FROM board b WHERE b.m_id = #{mid} and (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE m_id=#{mid} and b_id > b.b_id) BETWEEN #{lastRowNum} AND (#{lastRowNum} + 4) ORDER BY b.regdate DESC

select b.b_id from board b join board_like l on b.b_id = l.b_id where l.m_id = #{mid} and ( select count(*) from board_like l join board bb on l.b_id = bb.b_id where l.m_id=#{mid} and bb.b_id > b.b_id) between #{lastRowNum} and (#{lastRowNum} + 4) order by b.regdate desc
SELECT b_id FROM board WHERE m_id=#{mid} AND TRUNC(regdate) = TO_DATE(#{regdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY b_id DESC

SELECT MAX(consec_post) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.regdate) AS consec_post FROM member m LEFT JOIN board b ON m.m_id = b.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mid} AND TRUNC(b.regdate) BETWEEN TRUNC(m.regdate) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY TRUNC(b.regdate) - ROWNUM )
select count(*) as postCount from board where m_id=#{mid} and trunc(regdate, 'mm') = trunc(sysdate, 'mm')
SELECT * FROM board WHERE b_content LIKE '%' || #{b_content } || '%'

SELECT b_sentiment FROM ( SELECT b_sentiment FROM board WHERE TRUNC(regdate) = TO_DATE(#{regdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND m_id = #{m_id} GROUP BY b_sentiment ORDER BY COUNT(b_sentiment) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
